title: The Ghost Breakers cinema slide
brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This black and white slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Ghost Breakers’ featuring Bob Hope and Paulette Goddard distributed by Paramount Pictures. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to all edges of the image. “THU FRI SAT” has been scratched in to the lower edge of the glass.
